static HMixtureModel jMEF.HMixtureModel.build ( MixtureModel  f,
Clustering.CLUSTERING_TYPE  type 
) [static]

Builds a hierarchical mixture model from an input mixture model and a clustering type.

Parameters:
f input mixture model given in parameters (source parameters)
type type of the Bregman divergence used: right-sided, left-sided, or symmetric
Returns:
a hierarchical mixture model

MixtureModel jMEF.HMixtureModel.getMixtureModel ( int  precision,
Clustering.CLUSTERING_TYPE  type 
)

Extracts a mixture model for a given precision from the hierarchical mixture model.

The precision 1 corresponds to a mixture model with only one model. The precision size corresponds to the initial mixture model.

Parameters:
precision precision of the mixture model
type type of the Bregman divergence used: right-sided, left-sided, or symmetric
Returns:
mixture model for a given precision
